channel.title: Vekos - 2006 Oldschool Remake
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://oi62.tinypic.com/3005czt.jpg[/img]
[img]http://gaspull.geeksaresexytech.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/themes/geeksaresexy/images/socialmedia/facebook.png[/img] [img]http://artes.ucp.pt/ojs/public/site/images/jccardoso/twitter-logo.png[/img] [img]http://png-3.findicons.com/files/icons/2155/social_media_bookmark/32/youtube.png[/img] [hr]
[i][font=century gothic][size=2em][b]About Us[/b][/size][/font][/i] Vekos is a 2006 remake like nothing seen before! We know what you're thinking. "Another 2006 remake..." WRONG. We are not just another remake, we are [i]the[/i] remake. We contain content that has not been seen in any other 2006 remake! For example: we have every working F2P quest, plus 20 members quest (and counting), functioning minigames and so much more to offer! We will keep the latest update on this thread for you to see our progress.
We will be releasing an open testing stage on the [b]21st March 2015[/b]! [hr]
[b]- Key -[/b]
Hasn't been started In progress Completed
[size=18pt]Combat[/size] [SPOILER=Combat]
[img]http://www.runescape.com/img/rsp777/hiscores/skill_icon_attack1.gif[/img] [b]MELEE[/b] Formulas (correct information, max hit, ect.) Animations Special Attacks Abyssal Whip Dragon Dagger Dragon Scimitar Dragon Longsword Dragon Spear Granite Maul Guthan's Dhahok's Torag's Verac's
[img]http://www.runescape.com/img/rsp777/hiscores/skill_icon_ranged1.gif[/img] [b]RANGED[/b] Formula (correct information, max hit, ect.) Ava's Accumulator Bows Darts Throwing Knives Throwing Axes Special Attacks Magic Bow
[img]http://www.runescape.com/img/rsp777/hiscores/skill_icon_magic1.gif[/img] [b]MAGIC[/b] Formula (correct information, max hit, ect.) Auto-Casting Basic Staffs Ancient Staff Special Attacks Spells All basic spells Tele-other spells Ancient spells
[/SPOILER]
[size=18pt]Skilling[/size] [SPOILER=Skilling]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RM4Nq7Q.gif?1[/img] [b]PRAYER[/b] Burying bones Prayer bonuses
[img]http://i.imgur.com/71cYIqD.gif?1[/img] [b]WOODCUTTING[/b] Cutting Trees Axe Requirements Tree Requirements Success Formula
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EgxSPOn.gif?1[/img] [b]FLETCHING[/b] Carving logs Adding bowstrings
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SbU41Fl.gif?1[/img] [b]FISHING[/b] Small Net Fishing Rod Fishing Fly Fishing Big Net Fishing Harpoon Fishing Cage Fishing River Troll Random
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pSTGmni.gif?1[/img] [b]FIREMAKING[/b] Required Levels
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ijnYJVO.gif?1[/img] [b]COOKING[/b] Item Cooking Correct Burning Chances
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qqYuzTC.gif?1[/img] [b]SMITHING[/b] Ore Smithing Anvil Smithing
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Vm4hPl0.gif?1[/img] [b]MINING[/b] Rock Mining Rock Prospecting Gem Mining Pickaxe Breaking
[img]http://i.imgur.com/U3UNvzU.gif?1[/img] [b]HERBLORE[/b] Herb Cleaning Herb Identifying Mixing unf pots Mixing finished pots
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wEjJX7b.gif?1[/img] [b]AGILITY[/b] Gnome Agility Course Wilderness Agility Course Barbarian Agility Course Shortcuts
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YuJFSOz.gif?1[/img] [b]THIEVING[/b] Pickpocketing Stall Thieving Stunning Door lockpicks Chest lockpicks
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AHnHibI.gif?1[/img] [b]SLAYER[/b] Task Receiving Level of tasks - easy, medium, and hard Stores Proper NPC's in correct places around Vekos
[img]http://i.imgur.com/mkNPjWU.gif?1[/img] [b]CRAFTING[/b] Cutting Gems Tanning Leather Crafting Moulding Jewelry Spinning Stringing amulets Stringing necklaces Pottery
[img]http://i.imgur.com/n2VZRit.gif?1[/img] [b]RUNECRAFT[/b] Correct Locations All basic runes Runecrafting nat runes Runecrafting law runes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2nK8Uk8.gif?1[/img] [b]FARMING[/b] Coming soon.
[/SPOILER]
[size=18pt]Minigames[/size] [SPOILER=Minigames]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Xeth9.gif[/img] [b]BARROWS[/b] Digging Brother battles Chest reward
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Xeth9.gif[/img] [b]CASTLE WARS[/b] Waiting Lobby All working doors All working ladders All working gates Proper hood and cape per team Getting the flag Shortcuts Equipment tables Barricades Falling rocks passageway
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Xeth9.gif[/img] [b]DUEL ARENA[/b] All working rules Staking items Duel tie Obstacle arena Open arena
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Xeth9.gif[/img] [b]FIGHT CAVES[/b] 63 waves Fire cave reward Proper NPC's per wave Wave saving
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Xeth9.gif[/img] [b]PEST CONTROL[/b] Working boats Working gates Game ending after all portals killed Time start between games Proper NPC's Reward shop/points
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Xeth9.gif[/img] [b]RANGING GUILD[/b] Coming soon.
[/SPOILER]
[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]Media[/SIZE][/FONT] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/9a46e53f0ae5d38a9a54f375744c97dc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/2e0948d596ff3ca5191edad5cf3f2292.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/fec22134f8d3936a66842967de11c2e9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/b99db3e505501bae42b04c73275f86d8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/2e73799e7da7a1e4c67b1135e7822c54.png[/img]
[spoiler=More photos][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/714cd7c1406009498f1a287b4599ba14.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/41e6585aa5f1371c0c225300050eb636.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/9745df72dd2a9d7486510f481f4587f1.png[/img][/spoiler]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]Updates[/SIZE][/FONT]
[SPOILER=-][left]-Fixed clue scrolls being 'eaten' by NPC's -Added God D'hide and 3rd age to the level 3 clue scroll drop table -Fixed Gnome agility course with correct timers, distance and position checking, animations. -Added Barbarian agility course -Updated the login screen -Fixed MANY dialogues, (ie: bugged dialogues, missing dialogues, quest dialogues) -Wrote base of the Champion's Challenge miniquest -Added wall safes in the Rogue's Den with correct timers, animations, drop rates -Added a "Pay toll" option to the Al-Kharid gates -Fixed the bug where you could teleport anywhere with level 3 or lower magic -Fixed object duplication bug when updating player height -Chance of 3rd age from a clue scroll is now 1/1000 -Fixed challenge scrolls (wouldn't go to next dialogue) -Started on Easter event! (Giving eggs, egg basket animations) -Finished Romeo & Juliet quest, with cutscenes -Changed interfaces within the client, attack styles tab now shows combat level, and skill tab just shows total level and quest points without the combat level. -Completed Easter Event -Fixed many npc spawns -Changed random event chance from 1/3000 to 1/1000 -Added toy horseys -Added spinning wheels -Added south varrock gate agility shortcut (13 agility req) -Added base for cats following -Added many more thieving spots (lock picking, chest trap disabling) -Fixed duel arena! (Would make you unable to do ANYTHING inside the arena after accepting duel request) Duel arena is now 100% fully functional -Wrote Dragon Slayer -Fixed a lot of npc definitions and animations -Improved NPC aggression follow distance -Got cache downloader ready for testing stage & release -Added defence requirements for gilded, and god armors -Added charging orbs and battlestaff making -Added 25 NPC spawns -Added about 20% of all magic sounds to spells (including hit sounds splash sounds for each spell) -Fixed a couple animations regarding melee and magic -Fixed Fishing Contest quest journals, and a bug where it was not able to be completed. -Added several itemOnInterfaces to quest finishes -Fixed typos, added substrings to quest journals (touched up, more professional)[/left][/SPOILER][/CENTER]
[hr]
[font=century gothic][size=2em][b][size=15pt]CREDITS[/size][/b] [size=12pt]- Jagex (RuneScape) - 2006Scape - Mod Rovas (for Forum advert look) - Mod Eletram - Mod Syn[/size][/size][/font][/center]

item.title: Vekos - 2006 Oldschool Remake
item.dc:creator: @Vekos Vekos
item.description:
@Vekos wrote:

Added to our update list -

Update List

-Fixed clue scrolls being ‘eaten’ by NPC’s
-Added God D’hide and 3rd age to the level 3 clue scroll drop table
-Fixed Gnome agility course with correct timers, distance and position checking, animations.
-Added Barbarian agility course
-Updated the login screen
-Fixed MANY dialogues, (ie: bugged dialogues, missing dialogues, quest dialogues)
-Wrote base of the Champion’s Challenge miniquest
-Added wall safes in the Rogue’s Den with correct timers, animations, drop rates
-Added a “Pay toll” option to the Al-Kharid gates
-Fixed the bug where you could teleport anywhere with level 3 or lower magic
-Fixed object duplication bug when updating player height
-Chance of 3rd age from a clue scroll is now 1/1000
-Fixed challenge scrolls (wouldn’t go to next dialogue)
-Started on Easter event! (Giving eggs, egg basket animations)
-Finished Romeo & Juliet quest, with cutscenes
-Changed interfaces within the client, attack styles tab now shows combat level, and skill tab just shows total level and quest points without the combat level.
-Completed Easter Event
-Fixed many npc spawns
-Changed random event chance from 1/3000 to 1/1000
-Added toy horseys
-Added spinning wheels
-Added south varrock gate agility shortcut (13 agility req)
-Added base for cats following
-Added many more thieving spots (lock picking, chest trap disabling)
-Fixed duel arena! (Would make you unable to do ANYTHING inside the arena after accepting duel request) Duel arena is now 100% fully functional
-Wrote Dragon Slayer
-Fixed a lot of npc definitions and animations
-Improved NPC aggression follow distance
-Got cache downloader ready for testing stage & release
-Added defence requirements for gilded, and god armors
-Added charging orbs and battlestaff making
-Added 25 NPC spawns
-Added about 20% of all magic sounds to spells (including hit sounds splash sounds for each spell)
-Fixed a couple animations regarding melee and magic
-Fixed Fishing Contest quest journals, and a bug where it was not able to be completed.
-Added several itemOnInterfaces to quest finishes
-Fixed typos, added substrings to quest journals (touched up, more professional)

Read full topic

item.title: Vekos - 2006 Oldschool Remake
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:10, topic:550472”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=669379.msg4476379#msg4476379 date=1426122356]
One of the 1,000 06’ remakes I’ve seen in the past month. Neat.
[/quote]
Yeah, pretty much. Still, the advertisement gives out an interesting vibe that would make me interested but I probably wouldn’t bother coming online as I see no reason to grind something that is already up and official (regardless if Jagex’s version is '07).[/quote]

True, but I actually enjoy how Jagex is running 07. Updated based on community suggestions and polls; they should’ve started doing that a long time ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Vekos - 2006 Oldschool Remake
item.dc:creator: @Vekos Vekos
item.description:
@Vekos wrote:

[center]


[hr]

[font=century gothic][size=2em]About Us[/size][/font]
Vekos is a 2006 remake like nothing seen before! We know what you’re thinking. “Another 2006 remake…” WRONG. We are not just another remake, we are the remake. We contain content that has not been seen in any other 2006 remake! For example: we have every working F2P quest, plus 20 members quest (and counting), functioning minigames and so much more to offer! We will keep the latest update on this thread for you to see our progress.

We will be releasing an open testing stage on the 21st March 2015!
[hr]

- Key -

Hasn’t been started
In progress
Completed

[size=18pt]Combat[/size]
[SPOILER=Combat]

RANGING GUILD

[/spoiler]

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]Updates[/SIZE][/FONT]

[SPOILER=-][left]-Fixed clue scrolls being ‘eaten’ by NPC’s
-Added God D’hide and 3rd age to the level 3 clue scroll drop table
-Fixed Gnome agility course with correct timers, distance and position checking, animations.
-Added Barbarian agility course
-Updated the login screen
-Fixed MANY dialogues, (ie: bugged dialogues, missing dialogues, quest dialogues)
-Wrote base of the Champion’s Challenge miniquest
-Added wall safes in the Rogue’s Den with correct timers, animations, drop rates
-Added a “Pay toll” option to the Al-Kharid gates
-Fixed the bug where you could teleport anywhere with level 3 or lower magic
-Fixed object duplication bug when updating player height
-Chance of 3rd age from a clue scroll is now 1/1000
-Fixed challenge scrolls (wouldn’t go to next dialogue)
-Started on Easter event! (Giving eggs, egg basket animations)
-Finished Romeo & Juliet quest, with cutscenes
-Changed interfaces within the client, attack styles tab now shows combat level, and skill tab just shows total level and quest points without the combat level.
-Completed Easter Event
-Fixed many npc spawns
-Changed random event chance from 1/3000 to 1/1000
-Added toy horseys
-Added spinning wheels
-Added south varrock gate agility shortcut (13 agility req)
-Added base for cats following
-Added many more thieving spots (lock picking, chest trap disabling)
-Fixed duel arena! (Would make you unable to do ANYTHING inside the arena after accepting duel request) Duel arena is now 100% fully functional
-Wrote Dragon Slayer
-Fixed a lot of npc definitions and animations
-Improved NPC aggression follow distance
-Got cache downloader ready for testing stage & release
-Added defence requirements for gilded, and god armors
-Added charging orbs and battlestaff making
-Added 25 NPC spawns
-Added about 20% of all magic sounds to spells (including hit sounds splash sounds for each spell)
-Fixed a couple animations regarding melee and magic
-Fixed Fishing Contest quest journals, and a bug where it was not able to be completed.
-Added several itemOnInterfaces to quest finishes
-Fixed typos, added substrings to quest journals (touched up, more professional)[/left][/SPOILER][/CENTER]
